Description:
Middle East Mattress Factory Co., a leading mattress manufacturer in the MENA region, is seeking a Production Supervisor to join their team. As a family-owned company with a long history of collaboration with Sealy Inc USA, the successful candidate will play a key role in producing high-quality, innovative mattresses for customers across the region. The Production Supervisor will oversee the day-to-day operations of the production team, ensuring that production schedules are met, quality standards are upheld, and safety regulations are followed.Supervise and coordinate the activities of production workers, ensuring that daily production targets are met.
Identify areas for improvement in production processes and implement changes to increase efficiency and productivity.
Train and develop production staff, ensuring that all team members have the necessary skills and knowledge to perform their roles effectively.
Monitor production quality and identify defects or issues, taking corrective action as necessary.
Maintain accurate production records and reports, ensuring that data is entered into the company database in a timely and accurate manner.
Ensure that all safety protocols are followed, and that production staff comply with all relevant safety regulations.
Liaise with other departments, such as procurement and logistics, to ensure that production targets are met in line with customer demands.Job Details
